sourcesContent:
import resolveConfig from "tailwindcss/resolveConfig"
import config from "./tailwind.config.js"
const tw_config = resolveConfig(config)

const THEME_COLORS = tw_config.theme.cool_fresh.colors

const PRIMARY = THEME_COLORS.primary
const TEXT_PRIMARY = THEME_COLORS.text_primary
const TEXT_SECONDARY = THEME_COLORS.text_secondary
const ACCENT_DARK = THEME_COLORS.accent_dark
const ACCENT_LIGHT = THEME_COLORS.accent_light
